article_title: Robbery leads to shooting near 27th Street, Woodland Avenue
article_text:
One person suffered life-threatening injuries in a shooting overnight in east Kansas City.

Police said the shooting began as an armed robbery attempt near 27th Street and Woodland Avenue.

Police have not announced any arrests.

article_metadata.author: Matt Evans
